title: A Taste of Fire #1
description: Zara always knew she was different. A young woman with an old soul.Plagued by amnesia and scars that etch her back, a lingering reminder of a forgotten past. She navigates her life like a dream with the torment of questions and emotions she cannot define.When an alluring stranger awakens her deepest memories, Zara realizes that her amnesia and emotions are connected to something even more extraordinary than she ever imagined.She is the weapon in a centuries-old battle. Her blood is an aphrodisiac to the underworld, and those who drink it are drawn to her like moths to a flame. Between vampires and hunters, Zara is not sure who she can trust.As Zara's past comes back to haunt her, she must decide who she can love and who can destroy her.
author: R. Tezak
